channel.title: Remove Death-Knight Death-Prediction Gold
channel.description: As a dead player, you can "farm" gold off Death Knights by predicting on day 2 of the Death Knight's life. This isn't game breaking, but still an exploit of sorts. Simply don't allow dead players to predict death on Death Knights.

item.title: Remove Death-Knight Death-Prediction Gold
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Like when someone dies of poison or bleed?

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Death-Knight Death-Prediction Gold
item.dc:creator: moon2SMEG
item.description:
As a dead player, you can “farm” gold off Death Knights by predicting on day 2 of the Death Knight’s life. This isn’t game breaking, but still an exploit of sorts. Simply don’t allow dead players to predict death on Death Knights.
